__e: Look, it wouldn't be the first time we were fooled by an inmate.
My lords, it is a very hard thing to say that we cannot trust the King and that we have already been deceived for so long.
Your father and I are in agreement here because we were lied to for a really long time by you and by a colleague.
We just got blindsided, and we dealt with it.
I feel sick to my stomach knowing our friends, our neighbors, are being swindled and that you continue to work for the man responsible.
I'm very, very sorry but you're dead wrong and I am certainly not who you think I am!
